query.main: select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and (ufield='200' and usubfield in ('a','b','c','d'))
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!)
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and (ufield like '7%' and usubfield in ('a','b'))
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and (ufield='210' and usubfield in ('c'))

select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and ((ufield='225' and usubfield in ('a')) OR (ufield='410' and usubfield in ('t')))

select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and ((ufield='225' and usubfield in ('i')) OR (ufield='411' and usubfield in ('t')))
select distinct recid as notice_id from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (ufield='010' or ufield='011' or ufield='345' or ufield='073') and usubfield='a' and !!multiple_term!!
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and ((ufield like '60%'))
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and (ufield like '67%')

input.name: doctype
input.restrictquery: SELECT group_concat(distinct typdoc SEPARATOR ',') as all_typdoc from notices

query.main: select distinct recid as notice_id from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (value='!!p!!') and (ufield='dt') order by value
select distinct recid as notice_id from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where 1

input.query: select idcaddie,name from caddie where type='NOTI'

query.main: select distinct recid as notice_id entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where 1

select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and (ufield like '300' or ufield like '300' or ufield like '327' or ufield like '330')
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and (ufield like '610')
select distinct recid as notice_id, !!pert_term!! as pert from entrepot_source_!!current_source!! where (!!where_term!!) and ufield like '500' and usubfield='a'
select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where !!multiple_term!! order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew
query.multipleTerm: notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text like '%!!p!!%'

query.main: select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where !!multiple_term!! order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew
query.multipleTerm: notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text like '%!!p!!%'

query.main: select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text like '!!p!!%' order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew

select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text like '%!!p!!' order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew

select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text='!!p!!' order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew

select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text='!!p!!' order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew

select distinct notice_id from notices left join notices_custom_values on notices_custom_origine=notice_id where (notices_custom_champ=!!field!! or notices_custom_champ is null) and (notices_custom_small_text='' or notices_custom_small_text is null) order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew

select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where notices_custom_champ=!!field!! and notices_custom_origine=notice_id and notices_custom_small_text!='' order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew
select distinct notice_id from notices,notices_custom_values where !!multiple_term!! order by index_serie, tnvol, index_sew
